name: Lost Souls (NikitaChernin)
description:
LOST SOULS

Every one has two souls. A good and a bad one. When, in harmony, life is balanced. But when they spilt, chaos arises. Work you way into harmony between these 2 sides of your soul! 

Credits 

Game Design/Programmer/Writer = Nikita 

Art assets used from Kenny Game Assets

This game made in 12 hours for BenBonk Game Jam 3. While the jam is 72 hours I only had 12 because of my participation in another jam. Audio is non-existent because I ran out of time.
